name: EVEning Course
description:
"allure"

In EVEning Course there is a problem: You are in love with a foreign movie star. The solution: Take an evening course to learn the language, and before you know it, you'll have a date!

This title is an original ATP Projects release, published 2008-01-30. It was written, produced and directed by mikey. The character art was made by Kathryn. The title uses the Ren'Py engine modified by PyTom. Estimated completion time is 40 minutes.

EVEning Course is game Nr. 14 of the Original 22.
